channel.title: Killzone 2 Demo
channel.description:
Really liked it. Still a few tweaks are needed, like increasing the default sensitivity, but otherwise a really nice looking game. Can't really talk about too much as it was a short demo, but looks like this is going to be the hit Sony have been working so hard on.
Thoughts?

item.title: Killzone 2 Demo
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I had the online beta and the speed of the aiming and such is much quicker, there is no cover system online and it is generally a much quicker game.
Also, the demo must of been a really old build, because the ONLINE beta looked so much better in terms of particle effects, lighting and textures.

But yeah, loved it - its really surprising at how much of a more tactical shooter it is in the SP game than it is in the MP side of things. The game is the best FPS i’ve played online on a console.

Read full topic
